response.original_title: I Spit on Your Naked Corpse
response.overview: Horror - SADOMASTER - A mysterious Masked Avenger begins his brutal revenge against gangs and the corrupt politicians. CHINA WHITE SERPENTINE - Struggling writer is investigating the mysterious death of his younger brother. SEPARATION ANXIETY: DEAD BODY MAN 2 - Willie is back for another round of killing and porn watching. BIZARRE LUST OF A SEXUAL DEVIANT - A prowler is on the loose in the city. I SPIT ON YOUR CORPSE, I PISS ON YOUR GRAVE (ORIGINAL CUT) - Sandy was abducted and brought to this pit of pain as the next intended victim.
response.title: I Spit on Your Naked Corpse
